description: Connect with practitioners across government: discussions, blogs and resources.

topic_content.description: The design community is for anyone who wants to discuss and learn about the role of design in government.
topic_content.title: Design community

topics.description: Connect with practitioners across government: discussions, blogs and resources.
topics.title: Communities

linked_items.description: The agile delivery community helps agile practitioners across government meet regularly and share experiences, observed behaviours and best practices.
linked_items.title: Agile delivery community

linked_items.description: The assisted digital and digital take-up community is for anyone interested in how to design support for users who need help online, and increase digital take-up.
linked_items.title: Assisted digital and digital take-up community

linked_items.description: The design community is for anyone who wants to discuss and learn about the role of design in government.
linked_items.title: Design community

linked_items.description: The performance and data analysis community is for anyone interested in how we can use data to improve government services and content.
linked_items.title: Performance and data analysis community

linked_items.description: The standards and assurance community is for anyone with an interest in government standards and how they can be used to build high quality digital services.
linked_items.title: Standards and assurance community

linked_items.description: The backend development community is for anyone with an interest in how we develop digital services for government.
linked_items.title: Technology community (backend development)

linked_items.description: The frontend developer community is for anyone with an interest in building accessible and scalable digital services for government.
linked_items.title: Technology community (frontend development)

linked_items.description: The technical architecture community is for anyone with an interest in what technology we need to build digital services for government.
linked_items.title: Technology community (technical architecture)

linked_items.description: The web operations community is for anyone with an interest in how web operations work for digital services for government.
linked_items.title: Technology community (web operations)

linked_items.description: The user research community is for anyone with an interest in user research and wants to discuss and learn about user research experiences and methods.
linked_items.title: User research community

linked_items.description: The user support community is coming soon.
linked_items.title: User support community
